dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context

Class ModuleConfigContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.util.AbstractExecutableExtension
      • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context.AbstractContext
        • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context.ModuleConfigContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContext, dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context.internal.ISelectionContextChangedListener, java.lang.Cloneable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension

    public class ModuleConfigContext
extends AbstractContext
implements dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context.internal.ISelectionContextChangedListener
    This class manages the selection context for the module configuration. Attribute access functions: 
     getAttributeNames()
 getAttribute( String <name> )
    The following attributes are available:
    • schemapath
    • datapath
    • editorid
    • dctxt
    • selectedDCtxt
    • configurationid
    • moduleid
    • type
    • category
    • layer
    • specVersion
    • swVersion
    • relVersion
    The attributes can be used to restrict the visibility of guided configuration wizards via the extension point. There the attributes have to be prefixed with the context id to be unique. The id ( "ModuleConfigContext" ) can be queried with 
     getId()
    To get a clone of the enabled context, use 
     clone()

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b

        Deprecated. Only for internal use
        Updates the module configuration context
        Parameters:
        project - The current selected configuration project
        enabled - The enable state
        schema - The schema path
        data - The data path
        editorId - The editor id
        moduleId - The module id
        configId - The configuration id
        dctxt - The DCtxt of the root node
        selectedDCtxt - The DCtxt of the currently selected node
        type - The type
        category - The category
        layer - The layer
        specVersion - The spec Version
        swVersion - The software version
        relVersion - The release version

        Deprecated. 
        Query the configuration project to which this module config context belongs. For internal use only.
        Returns:
        The ConfigurationProject for which the current module config context belongs, or null if the module config context is not enabled.
        Since:

      • getDCtxt

        public DCtxt getDCtxt()
        Query the DCtxt of the selected module configuration. The context is configured with the following options: OPT_MARK_CALCULATED|Opt.OPT_USE_NODE_OPERATION.
        Returns:
        The DCtxt of the module configuration or null if no module configuration is selected
        Since:
        2008.b

      • getSelectedDCtxt

        public DCtxt getSelectedDCtxt()
        Query the DCtxt of the currently selected node. The context is configured with the following options: OPT_MARK_CALCULATED|Opt.OPT_USE_NODE_OPERATION.
        Returns:
        The DCtxt of the currently selected node or null if no module configuration is selected at all
        Since:
        2010.a
